channel.title: The most basic script on all of moparisthebest.com!
channel.description:
This could be the most basic script on ALL of Moparisthebest.com.
It's for a game called "Clickage".
I just started learning Pascal today, and I have only done one tutorial. So, I made this one quickly for this game "Clickage"
http://addictinggames.com/clickage.html
[code]//Start the game and then start this immediately. //You will be Superman! //Easy enough, get to it!
program New; begin repeat movemousesmooth(494,517); clickmouse(494,517,True) until(false) end.[/code]

item.title: The most basic script on all of moparisthebest.com!

item.title: The most basic script on all of moparisthebest.com!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

ilyaostr9:

script sucks it kept clickiog the ad and gave me like a 100 popups

Dude, your a dumbass. I was totally lmaoing.
To keep that from happening, just stick this in:
[scar]
if(IsFunctionKeyDown(0)) then terminatescript;
[/scar]

Just hit shift and it will stop the script. I put it in all my scripts when I test, cuz I know I always screw up.
Haha, 100 popups…couldnt you have hit alt+tab? omfg so funny.

Edit: Alright, its crazy fast, superman, easy…but I got Wicked legit.

Read full topic

item.title: The most basic script on all of moparisthebest.com!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Instead of having to start the game before running the script, try this

[code]//Specify window as the clicker game area and click play!
//split second SUPERMAN!

program New;
var a : Integer;
begin
repeat
movemousesmooth(281,246);
clickmouse(281,246,True)
a:=a+1;
until(a=101)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: The most basic script on all of moparisthebest.com!
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

[quote=“retributionmike, post:6, topic:5335”]You can make it more precise to the game by adding a loop
like this

[code]
//Start the game and then start this immediately.
//You will be Superman!
//Easy enough, get to it!

program New;
begin
repeat
movemousesmooth(494,517);
clickmouse(494,517,True)
a:=a+1;
until(a=100)
end.
[/code][/quote]

forgot to add the variable at the top

Read full topic

You can make it more precise to the game by adding a loop
like this

//Start the game and then start this immediately.
//You will be Superman!
//Easy enough, get to it!


program New;
begin
repeat
movemousesmooth(494,517);
clickmouse(494,517,True)
a:=a+1;
until(a=100)
end.
